content: I accidentally wrote import Foo in Foo.lean in #11725 (for Foo = Mathlib.Algebra.BigOperators.List.Order) and the getting cache step instantly overflowed: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8470947044/job/23209945412?pr=11725
I just made this same mistake, I would also like better behavior here.
